channel.title: Client Connection Issues
channel.description:
I currently have a client and for some people it just keeps saying: connection error 1 connection error 2 connection error 3 connection error 4 connection error 5 connection error 6 connection error 7 connection error 8 connection error 9 connection error 10 Connection Reseting
This appears on the bar that loads.
My client run button code is: [code]@echo off title [317]Holypkingscape[317] Client start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI EXIT[/code]

item.title: Client Connection Issues
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

4markie:

Your cache is either corrupt or missing.

Thanks i uploaded again for people to have, and it worked perfectly! Thank you!

Read full topic
